output.sentences: A man with a blue shirt stands near a tree and looks at the ground.
The man in the blue shirt crosses his arms and stands next to a woman in red with a white head wrap on her head.
The woman in red clasp her hands together while looking at the camera.
The guy in the blue shirt crosses his arms again and looks at the ground the woman in red fixes a stern facial expression.
A man with a white shirt and knitted cap talks on a jeweled bull horn.
